titles.title: Establishing a whistleblower hotline for purposes of reporting waste, fraud, abuse, or mismanagement of taxpayer funds to the Select Subcommittee on the Coronavirus Crisis.
Establishing a whistleblower hotline for purposes of reporting waste, fraud, abuse, or mismanagement of taxpayer funds to the Select Subcommittee on the Coronavirus Crisis.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care
Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: This resolution directs the Select Subcommittee on the Coronavirus Crisis to establish a hotline for individuals to report (via telephone or other electronic communication) waste, fraud, abuse, or mismanagement of taxpayer funds appropriated to address the coronavirus (i.e., the virus that causes COVID-19) crisis.
